remarks: The base set of ` Z/nZ ` structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
statement:
znbas.s $e |- S = ( RSpan ` ZZring ) $.
znbas.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
znbas.r $e |- R = ( ZZring ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) $.
znbas $p |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( ZZ /. R ) = ( Base ` Y ) ) $.
